page.title: 09MANOR HOUSES
page.content: THE MANOR. Mr. Beresford gave us each a thing to do on the village for the Doomsday Project,and we got buildings.We were asked to look around the Manor so first of all we tried to find the 'phone number,but we couldn't. So then we found out that they weren't in in the week,so we wrote a letter to them and said could we go and look around the Manor.They wrote back and said yes,we could go but we would have to get the key off the builder who was building there. So we went on a Thursday.Our first step was into the sitting room and we found out that there was a large fireplace as high as me and 5 feet wide.There were exposed beams in the walls and ceiling,and a wooden floor.There were no original windows. (Continued).
